SEARCH
Package Network.RMI

Class Client_RMI

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
Network.RMI.Client_RMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote, ClientCallback
public class Client_RMI extends UnicastRemoteObject implements ClientCallback
The Client_RMI class represents an RMI client for the game server. It extends the UnicastRemoteObject class and implements the ClientCallback interface. This class is responsible for handling RMI-based communication between the client and the server.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Client_RMI

      public Client_RMI(String name, String ipaddress) throws RemoteException, NotBoundException, MalformedURLException
      Constructs a new Client_RMI object with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the client
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs
      NotBoundException - if the server is not bound in the RMI registry
      MalformedURLException - if the URL for the RMI registry is malformed
